name: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight -Re LIVE-
description:
A new story of the stage girls opens The original story of the large volume game drawn by Voice & Live 2 D by gorgeous cast. Musical, 9 people from St. Xiang Music School appearing in animation, as well as 15 people in the game original stage girls appeared! It is an authentic RPG that you can enjoy new developments of "Girl ☆ Opera Revue Starlight". 
◆ a powerful review drawn in full 3D! A turn-based battle system of a new sense that reproduced the brilliance of the stage girl, powerfulness. Simple but wide-ranging strategy and plenty of elements to take in! 
◆ Songs that appeared in the works also appeared one after another! Over 10 songs in initial music! Songs sung by stage girls such as animation OP "Star Dialogue" and game theme song "Discovery!" Direct the review! Songs will be added one after another!
